title: CMS Tool
settings_xorkey_placeholder: XOR Key used to decrypt and encrypt content
settings_decrypt_default: Decrypts the content file exactly as it was encrypted.
settings_decrypt_format: Decrypts the content file and formats it with indentation for more readable look.
settings_decrypt_parts: Decrypts the content file and splits it into parts for easier editing.
settings_encrypt_v1: Content will be encrypted only via selected XOR Key.
settings_encrypt_v2: Content will be encrypted with both, selected XOR Key and GZIP encoding.
menu_cms_decrypt_placeholder: Path to content file (v1 or v2)
menu_cms_encrypt_placeholder: Path to content as json OR path to ._meta.json if by parts
menu_dlc_cms_placeholder: Path to encrypted content (v1 or v2)
default_error: Something went wrong, check logs for details
task_decryption_fail_log_01: Cannot decrypt content file - IsV2 {0} - Xor {1}
task_decryption_fail_log_02: Cannot write decrypted content file - Decrypt start {0}
task_dlc_cms_active_long: {ref:task_dlc_cms} - Hold on, this may take a while...
task_dlc_cms_fail_log: Cannot download images from CMS - IsV2 {0} - Xor {1}
task_dlc_done: {ref:null_task} - Locally saved DLC imaged were decoded
task_encryption_fail_log: Cannot encrypt content file - Encrypt version {0}
picker_encode: Select content JSON or ._meta.json if content was splitted by parts
dlc_cms_tip: You can close this window if you want to stop download process
dlc_cms_done: Download finished. You can close this window now
